golden_triangle_tours.title: Golden Triangle Tours
golden_triangle_tours.subtitle: Discover the cultural heritage of India through Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur
golden_triangle_tours.description: Experience India's rich history and vibrant culture with our Golden Triangle tour packages. This classic circuit connects Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur, offering a perfect introduction to India's magnificent monuments, royal heritage, bustling markets, and diverse culinary delights.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Delhi
itinerary.description: Arrive in Delhi, India's capital. Check into your hotel and spend the evening at leisure, perhaps exploring nearby markets or enjoying a welcome dinner featuring North Indian cuisine.

itinerary.title: Delhi Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Old and New Delhi. Visit Jama Masjid, enjoy a rickshaw ride through Chandni Chowk, see India Gate, Qutub Minar, and Humayun's Tomb. Experience the colonial grandeur of Lutyens' Delhi.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Agra
itinerary.description: Drive to Agra (4 hours). Visit the magnificent Taj Mahal at sunset. Explore Agra Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage site, and enjoy local Mughlai cuisine for dinner.

itinerary.title: Agra to Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri
itinerary.description: Optional sunrise visit to Taj Mahal. Drive to Jaipur (5-6 hours) with a stop at Fatehpur Sikri, the abandoned Mughal city. Evening arrival in Jaipur with free time to explore the Pink City.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Exploration
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Jaipur. Visit Amber Fort with elephant/jeep ride, City Palace, Jantar Mantar observatory, and Hawa Mahal. Evening shopping at local bazaars for textiles, jewelry, and handicrafts.

itinerary.title: Departure from Jaipur
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Jaipur airport/railway station for departure, or extend your stay with additional destinations.

highlights: Visit the iconic Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World
Explore UNESCO World Heritage sites in all three cities
Experience the contrast between Old and New Delhi
Discover the royal heritage of Rajasthan in Jaipur
Shop at vibrant markets for traditional handicrafts
Enjoy authentic regional cuisine from different parts of North India
Learn about India's diverse architectural styles spanning centuries

accommodations.description: Colonial-style luxury hotel in central Delhi with modern amenities, multiple dining options, and elegant decor reflecting India's rich heritage.

accommodations.description: Premium accommodation with views of the Taj Mahal, featuring Mughal-inspired architecture, spa facilities, and rooftop dining.

accommodations.name: Jaipur Palace Resort
accommodations.description: Restored heritage property with Rajasthani decor, traditional hospitality, courtyard dining, and cultural performances.

accommodations.name: Luxury Haveli Stay
accommodations.description: Boutique accommodation in restored traditional mansions offering authentic experiences with modern comforts across all three cities.
